data.name: The Haunted Grounds
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to The Haunted Grounds,

You are in a flooded Village alone, No one knows how you got there but their is someone or some unknown entity watching you.

Your main mission is to find VHS Tapes, Notes. Scattered around the Map without getting caught by the unknown entity, There are locked chests, doors That you must find a code/key to unlock.

Somewhere in the map there is items, to try and kill the Unknown entity.

There are Interactable Objects you can pick up such as Axes, Flashlights, Boxes and more

NOTE This game is a environment based game and is not a full Haunted Game.

Please note, This is my First Project on Steam, Expect some bugs and glitches I will fix them, I will be doing regular updates of the game, If you have any Issues? You can go to the Support Section and send a Email. Currently the Game is in Early Access! This is not the full version of the game! Full Version expected to be Released on (STEAM PLANNED RELEASE DATE) Thanks for your Patience.

Current Build: (In mainmenu screen)

- Exploration and completion challenge.
- Multiplayer Will be added once the game has fully been released.
- Early Access
- Cheap Price (Reason for low Price since its still in Development and isn't the Full Release)
- Windows Supported
- Game has Graphics Settings (Low, Med, High, Ultra)
- May add VR Support for SteamVR and Oculus after final Release (Oculus SDK V1.3 and Above, HTC Vive and other VR Headsets)

data.short_description: Introducing, "The Haunted Grounds" - a new and upcoming indie horror game, developed by BA747 and made in the Unity game engine. The Haunted Grounds is targeted for PC platforms, with ultra realistic graphics. It provides a new take on the psychological horror genre, with stunning graphics.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or Later
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz or higher (single core)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX®10 compliant video card or greater, 2GB video RAM or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Default/DirectX 9.0 Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: 32bit windows users need to ensure they have at least 4gb of ram usable on their system.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.0 Ghz or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX®10 compliant video card or greater, 4GB video RAM or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Default/DirectX 9.0 Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: Important - If the graphics look bad go into settings on the In-Game menu and change the graphics quality.
